select.name: raw-type
select.label: Select input file type
select.help: Specify the type of input file you want to use

filelist.name: mzml_paths
filelist.label: Select Thermo RAW files
filelist.help: Warning: Thermo RAW files cannot be read for now, the files will be automatically converted to mzML files

filelist.name: fasta
filelist.label: Select FASTA file
filelist.help: Specify the FASTA file you want to use

checkbox.name: prefilter
checkbox.label: Prefilter
checkbox.help: Only activate this option when you expect your search space to be huge and exceed the amount of memory.

string.name: prefilter_chunk_size
string.label: Chunk size
string.help: Split the FASTA file in chunks, high values may consume all available memory, low values will slow down the search.

number.name: bucket_size
number.label: Bucket size
number.help: How many fragments are in each internal mass bucket. Use a lower value (8192) for high-res MS/MS, and higher values for low-res MS/MS.

number.name: missed_cleavages
number.label: Missed cleavages
number.help: Number of missed cleavages to allow

number.name: min_len
number.label: Minimum peptide length
number.help: Minimum AA length of peptides to search

number.name: max_len
number.label: Maximum peptide length
number.help: Maximum AA length of peptides to search

string.name: cleave_at
string.label: Amino acids to cleave at
string.help: Leave empty for non-enzymatic digestion, use '$' to disable digestion and use sequences as they are in the file.

string.name: restrict
string.label: Do not cleave if this AA follows the cleavage site

checkbox.name: c_terminal
checkbox.label: Cleave at c terminus of matching amino acid

number.name: peptide_min_mass
number.label: Minimum peptide mass
number.help: Minimum monoisotopic mass of peptides to fragment

number.name: peptide_max_mass
number.label: Maximum peptide mass
number.help: Maximum monoisotopic mass of peptides to fragment

checklist.name: ion_kinds
checklist.label: Ion kinds
checklist.help: Which fragment ions to generate and search?

number.name: min_ion_index
number.label: Minimal ion index
number.help: Do not generate b1..bN or y1..yN ions for preliminary searching if value=N. Does not affect full scoring of PSMs.

keyvalues.name: variable_mods
keyvalues.label: Variable modifications
keyvalues.help: Use '[' and ']' for protein N-terminal and C-terminal modifications. Use '^' and '$' for peptide N-terminal and C-terminal modifications.

keyvalues.name: static_mods
keyvalues.label: Static modifications
keyvalues.help: Static modifications are applied after variable modifications.

string.name: decoy_tag
string.label: Decoy tag
string.help: The tag used to identify decoy entries in the FASTA database.

checkbox.name: generate_decoys
checkbox.label: Generate decoys
checkbox.help: If true, ignore decoys in the FASTA database matching 'Decoy tag', and generate internally reversed peptides.

range.name: da
range.label: Precursor tolerance
range.help: First value is substracted from the experimental precursor to match theoretical peptides

range.name: ppm
range.label: Precursor tolerance
range.help: First value is substracted from the experimental precursor to match theoretical peptides

range.name: da
range.label: Fragment tolerance
range.help: First value is substracted from the experimental precursor to match theoretical peptides

range.name: ppm
range.label: Fragment tolerance
range.help: First value is substracted from the experimental precursor to match theoretical peptides

range.name: isotope_errors
range.label: Isotope error
range.help: C13 isotopic envelope to consider for precursor

checkbox.name: wide_window
checkbox.label: Search in wide-window/DIA mode
checkbox.help: Ignore precursor tolerance and search in wide-window/DIA mode

checkbox.name: deisotope
checkbox.label: Perform deisotoping and charge state deconvolution on MS2 spectra

number.name: min_peaks
number.label: Minimum number of peaks per MS2 spectrum
number.help: Only process MS2 spectra with at least N peaks.

number.name: max_peaks
number.label: Maximum number of peaks per MS2 spectrum
number.help: Take the top N most intense MS2 peaks to search.

number.name: min_matched_peaks
number.label: Minimum number of matched b+y ions
number.help: Minimum number of matched b+y ions to use for reporting PSMs.

number.name: max_fragment_charge
number.label: Maximum fragment ion charge states to consider

select.name: tmt
select.label: TMT
select.help: Select the TMT type you want to use

checkbox.name: sn
checkbox.label: use Signal/Noise instead of intensity for TMT quant

checkbox.label: use Signal/Noise instead of intensity for TMT quant

select.name: peak_scoring
select.label: Peak scoring
select.help: Hybrid scoring combines RT-based and spectral-angle based scoring to identify the best MS1 peak to quantify. It is recommended that you do not change this setting.

select.name: integration
select.label: Integration
select.help: Use sum or peak of MS1 traces in peak.

number.name: spectral_angle
number.label: Spectral angle
number.help: Normalized spectral angle (vs. theoretical isotopic envelope) cutoff for calling an MS1 peak.

number.name: ppm_tolerance
number.label: ppm tolerance
number.help: Tolerance for DICE window around calculated precursor mass.

range.name: precursor_charge
range.label: Precursor Charge
range.help: If charge states are not annotated in the mzML, or if 'wide window' mode is turned on, then consider all precursors with a charge state between those two values.

checkbox.name: predict_rt
checkbox.label: Use retention time prediction model as an feature for LDA

number.name: report_psms
number.label: Number of PSMs to report for each spectra
number.help: Higher values might disrupt PSM rescoring.
